Text: 720p? this is new!? - will you be continuing this for future weeks?

Nope, "How to make in America" and few other were 720p.
It is reference encoding, every single parameter of both video and audio is substantially tweaked.
Next week - and till the end 272p.
This one is done for you and Jon (and I know to read between the lines). Do not worry and have not any second thoughts about - I have enjoy it, doing 12 hours long encoding and toasting my old, slow PC...

Thank you 20-40. Worth waiting for YOUR encode of any file.

Cheers
Jon
